attributes.action: ban the importation and sale of mustard oil for all purposes.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The use of mustard oil in food is severely restricted because of a high risk of heart diseases. 

The oil is imported labelled for external use only, but it is commonly sold on the food shelves. This results in it being used for cooking and therefore contributing to the unusally high level of heart disease in certainsections of the  community.
